mapper.update: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "public"."base_group_leader"; CREATE TABLE "public"."base_group_leader" ( "id" int4 NOT NULL, "group_id" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "user_id" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "description" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "crt_time" timestamp(0), "crt_user" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "crt_name" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "crt_host" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "upd_time" timestamp(0), "upd_user" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "upd_name" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "upd_host" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "attr1" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "attr2" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "attr3" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "attr4" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "attr5" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "attr6" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "attr7" varchar(255) COLLATE "default", "attr8" varchar(255) COLLATE "default" ) WITH (OIDS=FALSE); ALTER TABLE "public"."base_group_leader" ADD PRIMARY KEY ("id");
mapper.insert: insert into base_group_leader (id, group_id, user_id, description, crt_time, crt_user, crt_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_name, upd_host, attr1, attr2, attr3, attr4, attr5, attr6, attr7, attr8) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{group_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crt_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{crt_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crt_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crt_host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upd_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upd_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upd_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upd_host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attr4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attr5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attr6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attr7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attr8,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
